sections.heading: Latino and Puerto Rican Affairs Commission. Membership. Vacancies. Duties. Annual report. Staff. Authority.
sections.text:
Section 2-120 is repealed, effective July 1, 2016.

(P.A. 94-152, S. 1, 3; P.A. 03-229, S. 1; Sept. Sp. Sess. P.A. 09-7, S. 143; P.A. 10-1, S. 2; June 12 Sp. Sess. P.A. 12-2, S. 39; May Sp. Sess. P.A. 16-3, S. 209.)
